font.div: Â Â Â APPLETON CITY R-II SCHOOLS ANNOUNCEMENTS: Per Order from Governor Parson, Appleton City Schools will be remain closed, for the rest of the school year. Please check out the blog section below and our Facebook pages for the most current updates regarding, events and at home learning resources.

div.h6: The transformative learning experiences at Appleton City R-II School District are designed to help our students grow both in and out of the classroom. The school district is located in Appleton City, MO and reflects the vibrant energy of the area. Our passionate and skilled faculty and staff are here to help our students make an impact on the world.

p.span: We want you, the parents, students, and community to know that we are working very hard to provide the excellent education Appleton City R-II is known for. We have a calendar that is always updated and look forward to providing even more interaction through social media.

div.p: You are the key to our success. Knowing this, we are set to provide more readily available information to bridge the gap of knowing what is happening and going on in our District. Our parents are the supportive backbone to our students and we are asking for this same support with our great teachers. Thank you for all you do!

p.span: We desire to have communication open for everyone. This includes hearing from all of you. We realize that not everyone associated with our school is a parent, or even relative. Please find a way to take time and visit our school and see the pride of Appleton City R-II School District.

Our highly qualified staff are dedicated to making our District a unique experience enriched with academic rigor. Â We are equipped with up-to-date technology and are looking to expand even more. Our students deserve the best and we recognize this and are making strides to provide them with real world solutions while learning the real world problems at our school first.Â
